body_html: TensorFlow tf.Variable objects are not specific to neural networks, so baking "traininable" property in there seems wrong. There's tf.trainable_variables() and tf.add_to_collection(tf.GraphKeys.TRAINABLE_VARIABLES)
body_text: TensorFlow tf.Variable objects are not specific to neural networks, so baking "traininable" property in there seems wrong. There's tf.trainable_variables() and tf.add_to_collection(tf.GraphKeys.TRAINABLE_VARIABLES)
body: TensorFlow tf.Variable objects are not specific to neural networks, so baking "traininable" property in there seems wrong. There's `tf.trainable_variables()` and `tf.add_to_collection(tf.GraphKeys.TRAINABLE_VARIABLES)`
